named-query.name: CATEGORY_GUID_COUNT
named-query.query: SELECT COUNT(ac.uidPk) FROM AbstractCategoryImpl ac WHERE ac.guid = ?1

named-query.name: CATEGORY_SELECT_BY_GUID
named-query.query: SELECT ac FROM AbstractCategoryImpl ac WHERE ac.guid = ?1

named-query.name: CATEGORY_LIST_ROOT
named-query.query: SELECT ac FROM AbstractCategoryImpl ac WHERE ac.parentGuid IS NULL AND ac.catalog.uidPk = ?1

named-query.name: COUNT_ROOT_CATEGORIES
named-query.query: SELECT COUNT(ac.uidPk) FROM AbstractCategoryImpl ac WHERE ac.parentGuid IS NULL AND ac.catalog.uidPk = ?1

named-query.name: CATEGORY_LIST_SUBCATEGORY_UIDS
named-query.query: SELECT child.uidPk FROM AbstractCategoryImpl child, AbstractCategoryImpl parent WHERE parent.uidPk = ?1 AND child.parentGuid = parent.guid

named-query.name: CATEGORY_LIST_SUBCATEGORY
named-query.query: SELECT child FROM AbstractCategoryImpl child WHERE child.parentGuid = ?1

named-query.name: CATEGORY_UIDS_ALL
named-query.query: SELECT ac.uidPk FROM AbstractCategoryImpl ac

named-query.name: CATEGORY_UIDS_SELECT_BY_MODIFIED_DATE
named-query.query: SELECT ac.uidPk FROM AbstractCategoryImpl ac WHERE ac.lastModifiedDate >= ?1

named-query.name: CATEGORY_UID_SELECT_BY_CHILDREN_UIDS
named-query.query: SELECT parent.uidPk FROM AbstractCategoryImpl child, AbstractCategoryImpl parent WHERE child.parentGuid IS NOT NULL AND child.uidPk IN (:list) AND child.parentGuid = parent.guid

named-query.name: CATEGORY_UID_SELECT_BY_PARENT_UIDS
named-query.query: SELECT child.uidPk FROM AbstractCategoryImpl child, AbstractCategoryImpl parent WHERE parent.uidPk in (:list) AND child.parentGuid = parent.guid

named-query.name: CATEGORY_BY_UIDS
named-query.query: SELECT ac FROM AbstractCategoryImpl ac WHERE ac.uidPk in (:list)

named-query.name: CATEGORY_UIDS_FOR_CATALOG
named-query.query: SELECT ac.uidPk FROM AbstractCategoryImpl ac WHERE ac.catalog.uidPk = ?1

named-query.name: CATEGORY_UIDS_FOR_CATALOG_BY_CODE
named-query.query: SELECT ac.uidPk FROM AbstractCategoryImpl ac WHERE ac.catalog.code = ?1

named-query.name: COUNT_SUBCATEGORIES_IN_CATEGORY
named-query.query: SELECT count(child.uidPk) FROM AbstractCategoryImpl child, AbstractCategoryImpl parent WHERE parent.uidPk = ?1 and child.parentGuid = parent.guid

named-query.name: SUBCATEGORY_SELECT_BY_PARENT_GUID
named-query.query: SELECT child FROM AbstractCategoryImpl child WHERE child.parentGuid = ?1

named-query.name: FIND_CATALOG_FOR_CATEGORY
named-query.query: SELECT c.catalog FROM AbstractCategoryImpl c WHERE c.uidPk = ?1

named-query.name: LIST_CATALOGS_BY_GUIDS
named-query.query: SELECT c FROM CatalogImpl c WHERE c.code IN (:codes)

named-query.name: CATEGORY_ROOT_MAX_ORDERING
named-query.query: SELECT MAX(c.ordering) FROM AbstractCategoryImpl c WHERE c.catalog.uidPk = ?1 AND c.parentGuid IS NULL

named-query.name: CATEGORY_ROOT_MIN_ORDERING
named-query.query: SELECT MIN(c.ordering) FROM AbstractCategoryImpl c WHERE c.catalog.uidPk = ?1 AND c.parentGuid IS NULL

named-query.name: CATEGORY_CHILD_MAX_ORDERING
named-query.query: SELECT MAX(child.ordering) FROM AbstractCategoryImpl child, AbstractCategoryImpl parent WHERE parent.uidPk = ?1 and child.parentGuid = parent.guid

named-query.name: CATEGORY_CHILD_MIN_ORDERING
named-query.query: SELECT MIN(child.ordering) FROM AbstractCategoryImpl child, AbstractCategoryImpl parent WHERE parent.uidPk = ?1 and child.parentGuid = parent.guid

named-query.name: BRAND_FIND_BY_CODE
named-query.query: SELECT b FROM BrandImpl b WHERE b.code = ?1

named-query.name: BRANDS_IN_USE_LIST
named-query.query: SELECT DISTINCT b FROM ProductImpl p INNER JOIN p.brand b

named-query.name: BRAND_IN_USE_UIDPK_LIST
named-query.query: SELECT b.uidPk FROM ProductImpl p INNER JOIN p.brand b

named-query.name: BRAND_SELECT_ALL
named-query.query: SELECT b FROM BrandImpl b

named-query.name: BRAND_SELECT_BY_GUID
named-query.query: SELECT b FROM BrandImpl b WHERE b.code = ?1

named-query.name: BRAND_SELECT_BY_GUID_AND_CATALOG_GUID
named-query.query: SELECT b FROM BrandImpl b WHERE b.code = ?1 AND b.catalog.code = ?2

named-query.name: BRAND_GUID_SELECT_BY_GUID
named-query.query: SELECT b.code FROM BrandImpl b WHERE b.code = ?1

named-query.name: BRAND_SELECT_CATALOG_ALL
named-query.query: SELECT b FROM BrandImpl b WHERE b.catalog.uidPk = ?1 ORDER BY b.code

named-query.name: BRAND_SELECT_CATALOG_IN_LIST
named-query.query: SELECT b FROM BrandImpl b WHERE b.catalog.uidPk IN (:list)

named-query.name: BRAND_IN_USE_LIST
named-query.query: SELECT p.brand.uidPk FROM ProductImpl p WHERE p.brand.uidPk IN (:list)

named-query.name: BRAND_IN_USE
named-query.query: SELECT p.brand.uidPk FROM ProductImpl p WHERE p.brand.uidPk = ?1

named-query.name: CATALOG_IN_USE_BY_PRODUCT_TYPE
named-query.query: SELECT pt.uidPk FROM ProductTypeImpl pt LEFT JOIN pt.catalog c WHERE c.uidPk = ?1

named-query.name: CATALOG_IN_USE_BY_CATEGORY_TYPE
named-query.query: SELECT ct.uidPk FROM CategoryTypeImpl ct LEFT JOIN ct.catalog c WHERE c.uidPk = ?1

named-query.name: CATALOG_IN_USE_BY_BRAND
named-query.query: SELECT b.uidPk FROM BrandImpl b LEFT JOIN b.catalog c WHERE c.uidPk = ?1

named-query.name: CATALOG_IN_USE_BY_CMUSER
named-query.query: SELECT cm.uidPk FROM CmUserImpl cm LEFT JOIN cm.catalogs c WHERE c.uidPk = ?1

named-query.name: CATALOG_IN_USE_BY_SYNGROUP
named-query.query: SELECT sg.uidPk FROM SynonymGroupImpl sg LEFT JOIN sg.catalog c WHERE c.uidPk = ?1

named-query.name: CATALOG_IN_USE_BY_ATTRIBUTE
named-query.query: SELECT a.uidPk FROM AttributeImpl a LEFT JOIN a.catalog c WHERE c.uidPk = ?1

named-query.name: FIND_ALL_CATALOG_UIDS
named-query.query: SELECT c.uidPk FROM CatalogImpl c

named-query.name: FIND_ALL_CATALOGS
named-query.query: SELECT c FROM CatalogImpl c

named-query.name: FIND_ALL_MASTER_CATALOGS
named-query.query: SELECT c FROM CatalogImpl c WHERE c.master = true order by c.name

named-query.name: FIND_ALL_MASTER_CATALOG_UIDS
named-query.query: SELECT c.uidPk FROM CatalogImpl c WHERE c.master = true order by c.name

named-query.name: FIND_CATALOG_BY_UID
named-query.query: SELECT c FROM CatalogImpl c WHERE c.uidPk = ?1

named-query.name: FIND_CATALOG_BY_NAME
named-query.query: SELECT c FROM CatalogImpl c WHERE c.name = ?1

named-query.name: FIND_CATALOG_BY_CODE
named-query.query: SELECT c FROM CatalogImpl c WHERE c.code = ?1

named-query.name: FIND_CATALOG_UID_BY_CODE
named-query.query: SELECT c.uidPk FROM CatalogImpl c WHERE c.code = ?1

named-query.name: FIND_MASTER_CATALOGS_USING_LINKED_CATEGORIES
named-query.query: SELECT DISTINCT c FROM LinkedCategoryImpl lc JOIN lc.masterCategory mc JOIN mc.catalog c WHERE lc.catalog.code = ?1

named-query.name: FIND_MASTER_CATALOGS_USING_VIRTUAL_CATEGORIES
named-query.query: SELECT DISTINCT c FROM ProductCategoryImpl vpc, ProductCategoryImpl mpc, CategoryImpl vc, CategoryImpl mc JOIN mc.catalog c WHERE vc.catalog.code = ?1 AND vpc.product = mpc.product AND vpc.category.uidPk = vc.uidPk AND mpc.category.uidPk = mc.uidPk AND vc.virtual = true AND mc.virtual = false

named-query.name: VIRTUAL_CATALOG_NAME_BY_GUID
named-query.query: SELECT c.name FROM CatalogImpl AS c WHERE c.code = ?1

named-query.name: CATEGORY_UIDS_SELECT_BY_DELETED_DATE
named-query.query: select cd.categoryUid from CategoryDeletedImpl as cd WHERE cd.deletedDate >= ?1

named-query.name: CATEGORY_SELECT_BY_CODE
named-query.query: SELECT c FROM CategoryImpl AS c WHERE UPPER(c.code) = UPPER(?1)

named-query.name: CATEGORY_SELECT_BY_CODE_AND_CATALOG_CODE
named-query.query: SELECT c FROM CategoryImpl AS c WHERE UPPER(c.code) = UPPER(?1) AND c.catalog.code = ?2

named-query.name: CATEGORY_UID_SELECT_BY_CODE_AND_CATALOG_UID
named-query.query: SELECT c.uidPk FROM CategoryImpl c WHERE UPPER(c.code) = UPPER(?1) AND c.catalog.uidPk = ?2

named-query.name: CATEGORY_UID_SELECT_BY_CATEGORY_AND_CATALOG_CODE
named-query.query: SELECT c.uidPk FROM CategoryImpl c WHERE UPPER(c.code) = UPPER(?1) AND c.catalog.code = ?2

named-query.name: CATEGORY_CODE_SELECT_BY_UID
named-query.query: SELECT c.code FROM CategoryImpl c WHERE c.uidPk = ?1

named-query.name: CATEGORY_CODES_SELECT_BY_UIDS
named-query.query: SELECT c.code FROM CategoryImpl c WHERE c.uidPk IN (:list)

named-query.name: CATEGORY_FIND_BY_CODE_CATALOG
named-query.query: SELECT c FROM CategoryImpl c WHERE c.code = ?1 AND c.catalog.uidPk = ?2

named-query.name: CATEGORY_COUNT_BY_CODE
named-query.query: SELECT count(c.uidPk) FROM CategoryImpl c WHERE c.code = ?1

named-query.name: CATEGORY_LIST_AVAILABLE_ROOT
named-query.query: SELECT c FROM CategoryImpl c WHERE c.parentGuid IS NULL AND c.hidden = false AND c.startDate <= ?1 AND ( c.endDate IS NULL or c.endDate >= ?2 ) AND c.catalog.uidPk = ?3

named-query.name: CATEGORY_UIDS_AVAILABLE
named-query.query: SELECT c.uidPk FROM CategoryImpl c WHERE c.startDate <= ?1 AND ( c.endDate IS null OR c.endDate >= ?2 )

named-query.name: CATEGORY_NAME_IN_DEFAULT_LOCALE_BY_GUID
named-query.query: SELECT ldf.displayName FROM CategoryImpl c, IN(c.localeDependantFieldsMap) ldf WHERE c.guid = ?1 AND ldf.locale = c.catalog.defaultLocaleInternal

named-query.name: CATEGORY_EXISTS_FOR_COMPOUND_GUID
named-query.query: SELECT count(c.uidPk) from CategoryImpl c WHERE c.code = :categoryCode AND c.catalog.code = :catalogCode

named-query.name: CATEGORY_TYPE_SELECT_ALL
named-query.query: SELECT ct from CategoryTypeImpl ct

named-query.name: CATEGORY_TYPE_SELECT_ALL_EAGER
named-query.query: SELECT ct FROM CategoryTypeImpl ct LEFT OUTER JOIN FETCH ct.categoryAttributeGroupAttributes

named-query.name: CATEGORY_TYPE_BY_CATALOG_EAGER
named-query.query: SELECT ct FROM CategoryTypeImpl ct LEFT OUTER JOIN FETCH ct.categoryAttributeGroupAttributes WHERE ct.catalog.uidPk = ?1

named-query.name: CATEGORY_TYPE_COUNT_BY_NAME
named-query.query: SELECT count(ct.uidPk) FROM CategoryTypeImpl ct WHERE ct.name = ?1 AND ct.uidPk <> ?2

named-query.name: CATEGORY_TYPE_FIND_BY_NAME
named-query.query: SELECT ct FROM CategoryTypeImpl ct WHERE ct.name = ?1

named-query.name: CATEGORY_TYPE_NAME_FIND_BY_GUID
named-query.query: SELECT ct.name FROM CategoryTypeImpl ct WHERE ct.guid = ?1

named-query.name: CATEGORY_TYPE_FIND_BY_GUID
named-query.query: SELECT ct FROM CategoryTypeImpl ct WHERE ct.guid = ?1

named-query.name: CATEGORY_TYPE_USED_UIDS
named-query.query: SELECT DISTINCT ct.uidPk FROM CategoryImpl ac LEFT OUTER JOIN ac.categoryType ct

named-query.name: CATEGORY_LIST_CATEGORY_TYPE
named-query.query: SELECT ac FROM CategoryImpl ac LEFT OUTER JOIN ac.categoryType ct LEFT OUTER JOIN FETCH ac.attributeValueMap WHERE ct.uidPk = ?1

named-query.name: CATEGORY_TYPE_SELECT_CATALOG_ALL
named-query.query: SELECT ct FROM CategoryTypeImpl ct WHERE ct.catalog.uidPk = ?1 ORDER BY ct.guid

named-query.name: CATEGORY_TYPES_IN_USE
named-query.query: SELECT ac.categoryType.uidPk FROM CategoryImpl ac WHERE ac.categoryType.uidPk = ?1

named-query.name: CATEGORY_TYPE_DELETE_BY_CATALOG_UID
named-query.query: DELETE FROM CategoryTypeImpl ct WHERE ct.catalog.uidPk = ?1

named-query.name: DA_AUDIT_BY_DAID_ORDERSKUID
named-query.query: SELECT daAudit FROM DigitalAssetAuditImpl daAudit WHERE daAudit.orderSku.uidPk = ?1 AND daAudit.digitalAsset.uidPk = ?2

named-query.name: DIGITAL_ASSET_AUDIT_SELECT_ALL
named-query.query: SELECT da FROM DigitalAssetImpl da

named-query.name: DIGITAL_ASSET_SELECT_ALL
named-query.query: SELECT da FROM DigitalAsset da

named-query.name: GIFT_CERTIFICATE_SELECT_ALL
named-query.query: SELECT g FROM GiftCertificateImpl g

named-query.name: GIFT_CERTIFICATE_BY_UIDS
named-query.query: SELECT g FROM GiftCertificateImpl as g WHERE g.uidPk in (:list)

named-query.name: GIFT_CERTIFICATE_UIDS_ALL
named-query.query: SELECT g.uidPk FROM GiftCertificateImpl as g

named-query.name: GIFT_CERTIFICATE_UIDS_SELECT_BY_MODIFIED_DATE
named-query.query: SELECT g.uidPk FROM GiftCertificateImpl as g WHERE g.lastModifiedDate >= ?1

named-query.name: GIFT_CERTIFICATE_SELECT_BY_MODIFIED_DATE
named-query.query: SELECT g FROM GiftCertificateImpl as g WHERE g.lastModifiedDate >= ?1

named-query.name: GIFT_CERTIFICATE_FIND_BY_CODE
named-query.query: SELECT g FROM GiftCertificateImpl as g WHERE g.giftCertificateCode = ?1

named-query.name: GIFT_CERTIFICATE_FIND_BY_CODE_AND_STORE
named-query.query: SELECT g FROM GiftCertificateImpl as g WHERE g.giftCertificateCode = ?1 and g.store.uidPk = ?2

named-query.name: GIFT_CERTIFICATE_FIND_BY_GUID
named-query.query: SELECT g FROM GiftCertificateImpl as g WHERE g.guid = ?1

named-query.name: GIFT_CERTIFICATE_DETAIL_REPORT
named-query.query: SELECT gc FROM GiftCertificateImpl as gc WHERE gc.store.uidPk = ?1 AND (gc.creationDate >= ?2 OR ?2 IS NULL) AND (gc.creationDate <= ?3 OR ?3 IS NULL) AND gc.currencyCode IN (:list) AND (gc.orderGuid IS NULL OR gc.orderGuid NOT IN (SELECT o.orderNumber FROM OrderImpl o WHERE o.status = 'FAILED' AND o.orderNumber = gc.orderGuid)) ORDER BY gc.creationDate

named-query.name: GIFT_CERTIFICATE_SUMMARY_PURCHASED_REPORT
named-query.query: SELECT s.name, gc.currencyCode, SUM(gc.purchaseAmount) FROM StoreImpl as s, GiftCertificateImpl as gc WHERE gc.store.uidPk = s.uidPk AND s.uidPk IN (:list) AND (gc.currencyCode = ?1 OR ?1 IS NULL) AND (gc.creationDate >= ?2 OR ?2 IS NULL) AND (gc.creationDate <= ?3 OR ?3 IS NULL) AND (gc.orderGuid IS NULL OR gc.orderGuid NOT IN (SELECT o.orderNumber FROM OrderImpl o WHERE o.status = 'FAILED' AND o.orderNumber = gc.orderGuid)) GROUP BY s.name, s.code ,gc.currencyCode

named-query.name: GIFT_CERTIFICATE_SUMMARY_SPEND_REPORT
named-query.query: SELECT s.name, gc.currencyCode, SUM(gct.amount) FROM StoreImpl as s, GiftCertificateImpl as gc, GiftCertificateTransactionImpl as gct WHERE gc.store.uidPk = s.uidPk AND s.uidPk IN (:list) AND gct.giftCertificate.uidPk = gc.uidPk AND (gc.currencyCode = ?1 OR ?1 IS NULL) AND (gc.creationDate >= ?2 OR ?2 IS NULL) AND (gc.creationDate <= ?3 OR ?3 IS NULL) AND (gc.orderGuid IS NULL OR gc.orderGuid NOT IN (SELECT o.orderNumber FROM OrderImpl o WHERE o.status = 'FAILED' AND o.orderNumber = gc.orderGuid)) GROUP BY s.name, s.code, gc.currencyCode

named-query.name: LINKED_CATEGORY_SELECT_BY_MASTER_CATEGORY_UID
named-query.query: SELECT lc FROM LinkedCategoryImpl lc WHERE lc.masterCategory.uidPk = ?1

named-query.name: LINKED_CATEGORY_NAME_IN_DEFAULT_LOCALE_BY_MASTER_CATEGORY_GUID
named-query.query: SELECT ldf.displayName FROM LinkedCategoryImpl lc, IN(lc.masterCategory.localeDependantFieldsMap) ldf WHERE lc.guid = ?1 AND ldf.locale = lc.catalog.defaultLocaleInternal

named-query.name: LINKED_CATEGORY_LIST_AVAILABLE_ROOT
named-query.query: SELECT lc FROM LinkedCategoryImpl lc WHERE lc.parentGuid IS NULL AND lc.masterCategory.hidden = false AND lc.masterCategory.startDate <= ?1 AND ( lc.masterCategory.endDate IS NULL OR lc.masterCategory.endDate >= ?2 ) AND lc.catalog.uidPk = ?3

named-query.name: LINKED_CATEGORY_UIDS_AVAILABLE
named-query.query: SELECT lc.uidPk FROM LinkedCategoryImpl lc WHERE lc.masterCategory.startDate <= ?1 AND ( lc.masterCategory.endDate IS null OR lc.masterCategory.endDate >= ?2 )

named-query.name: LINKED_CATEGORY_FIND_BY_CODE_CATALOG
named-query.query: SELECT lc FROM LinkedCategoryImpl lc WHERE lc.masterCategory.code = ?1 AND lc.catalog.uidPk = ?2

named-query.name: LINKED_CATEGORY_FIND_BY_CODE_AND_CATALOG_CODE
named-query.query: SELECT lc FROM LinkedCategoryImpl lc WHERE lc.masterCategory.code = ?1 AND lc.catalog.code = ?2

named-query.name: LINKED_CATEGORY_UID_SELECT_BY_CATEGORY_AND_CATALOG_CODE
named-query.query: SELECT lc.uidPk FROM LinkedCategoryImpl lc WHERE lc.masterCategory.code = ?1 AND lc.catalog.code = ?2

named-query.name: LINKED_CATEGORY_COUNT_BY_CODE
named-query.query: SELECT count(lc) FROM LinkedCategoryImpl lc WHERE lc.masterCategory.code = ?1 AND lc.catalog.code = ?2

named-query.name: FIND_MASTER_CATALOG_FOR_LINKED_CATEGORY
named-query.query: SELECT lc.masterCategory.catalog FROM LinkedCategoryImpl lc WHERE lc.uidPk = ?1

named-query.name: LINKED_CATEGORY_CODE_SELECT_BY_UID
named-query.query: SELECT lc.masterCategory.code FROM LinkedCategoryImpl lc WHERE lc.uidPk = ?1

named-query.name: LINKED_CATEGORY_EXISTS_FOR_COMPOUND_GUID
named-query.query: SELECT count(c.uidPk) from LinkedCategoryImpl c WHERE c.masterCategory.code = :categoryCode AND c.catalog.code = :catalogCode

named-query.name: PRODUCTASSOCIATION_SELECT_BY_TARGETSKU_UIDS
named-query.query: SELECT pa FROM ProductAssociationImpl pa WHERE pa.targetSku.uidPk in (:list)

named-query.name: PRODUCTASSOCIATION_SELECT_BY_TARGETPRODUCT_UIDS
named-query.query: SELECT pa FROM ProductAssociationImpl pa WHERE pa.targetProduct.uidPk IN (:list)

named-query.name: PRODUCTASSOCIATION_SELECT_BY_SOURCEPRODUCT_UIDS
named-query.query: SELECT pa FROM ProductAssociationImpl pa WHERE pa.sourceProduct.uidPk IN (:list)

named-query.name: PRODUCTASSOCIATION_DELETE_BY_UID
named-query.query: DELETE FROM ProductAssociationImpl pa WHERE pa.uidPk = ?1

named-query.name: PRODUCTASSOCIATION_UIDS_BY_SOURCE_PRODUCT_CODE_AND_CATALOG
named-query.query: SELECT pa.uidPk FROM ProductAssociationImpl pa WHERE pa.sourceProduct.code = ?1 AND pa.catalog.code = ?2

named-query.name: DELETE_PRODUCT_ASSOCIATIONS_BY_UID
named-query.query: DELETE FROM ProductAssociationImpl pa WHERE pa.uidPk IN (:list)

named-query.name: DELETE_CATALOG_PRODUCT_ASSOCIATIONS_BY_SOURCE_PRODUCT_CODE
named-query.query: DELETE FROM ProductAssociationImpl pa WHERE pa.sourceProduct.code = ?1 AND pa.catalog.code = ?2

named-query.name: DELETE_PRODUCT_ASSOCIATIONS_BY_SOURCE_AND_TARGET_PRODUCT_CODE
named-query.query: DELETE FROM ProductAssociationImpl pa WHERE pa.sourceProduct.code = ?1 AND pa.targetProduct.code = ?2 AND pa.catalog.code = ?3

named-query.name: DELETE_PRODUCT_ASSOCIATIONS_BY_SOURCE_AND_TARGET_PRODUCT_CODE_AND_ASSOC_TYPE
named-query.query: DELETE FROM ProductAssociationImpl pa WHERE pa.sourceProduct.code = ?1 AND pa.targetProduct.code = ?2 AND pa.associationType = ?3 AND pa.catalog.code = ?4

named-query.name: DELETE_PRODUCT_ASSOCIATIONS_BY_SOURCE_AND_ASSOC_TYPE
named-query.query: DELETE FROM ProductAssociationImpl pa WHERE pa.sourceProduct.code = ?1 AND pa.associationType = ?2 AND pa.catalog.code = ?3

named-query.name: PRODUCTASSOCIATION_IN_CATALOG
named-query.query: SELECT COUNT(pa.uidPk) FROM ProductAssociationImpl pa, IN(pa.sourceProduct.productCategories) spc, IN(pa.targetProduct.productCategories) tpc WHERE pa.uidPk = ?1 AND spc.category.catalog = pa.catalog AND tpc.category.catalog = pa.catalog

named-query.name: PRODUCTASSOCIATION_EXISTS_IN_CATALOG
named-query.query: SELECT pa.uidPk FROM ProductAssociationImpl pa WHERE pa.sourceProduct.uidPk = ?1 AND pa.targetProduct.uidPk = ?2 AND pa.catalog.uidPk = ?3 AND pa.associationType = ?4

named-query.name: FILTER_EXISTING_PRODUCTASSOCIATIONS_IN_CATALOG
named-query.query: SELECT DISTINCT pa.targetProduct.uidPk FROM ProductAssociationImpl pa WHERE pa.targetProduct.uidPk IN(:list) AND pa.sourceProduct.uidPk = ?1 AND pa.catalog.uidPk = ?2 AND pa.associationType = ?3

named-query.name: DELETE_OBSOLETE_PRODUCTASSOCIATIONS
named-query.query: DELETE FROM ProductAssociationImpl pa WHERE pa.targetProduct.uidPk NOT IN(:list) AND pa.sourceProduct.uidPk = ?1 AND pa.catalog.uidPk = ?2 AND pa.associationType = ?3

named-query.name: MAX_FEATURED_ORDER_BY_CAT
named-query.query: SELECT max(pc.featuredProductOrder) FROM ProductCategoryImpl pc WHERE pc.category.uidPk = ?1

named-query.name: COUNT_PRODUCTS_IN_CATEGORY
named-query.query: SELECT count(pc.uidPk) FROM ProductCategoryImpl pc WHERE pc.category.uidPk = ?1

named-query.name: PRODUCTCATEGORY_DELETE_BY_CATEGORY_UID
named-query.query: DELETE FROM ProductCategoryImpl pc WHERE pc.category.uidPk = ?1

named-query.name: SELECT_CATEGORY_UID_BY_PRODUCT_UID
named-query.query: SELECT DISTINCT pc.category.uidPk FROM ProductCategoryImpl pc WHERE pc.product.uidPk = ?1

named-query.name: FIND_BY_PRODUCT_CATEGORY_UID
named-query.query: SELECT pc FROM ProductCategoryImpl AS pc WHERE pc.uidPk = ?1

named-query.name: FIND_BY_CATEGORY_GUID_AND_PRODUCT_CODE
named-query.query: SELECT pc FROM ProductCategoryImpl AS pc WHERE pc.category.guid = ?1 AND pc.product.code = ?2

named-query.name: FIND_BY_CATEGORY_UID
named-query.query: SELECT pc FROM ProductCategoryImpl AS pc WHERE pc.category.uidPk = ?1

named-query.name: FIND_PRODUCT_CATEGORIES_BY_CATEGORY_GUID
named-query.query: SELECT pc FROM ProductCategoryImpl AS pc WHERE pc.category.guid = ?1

named-query.name: PRODUCT_UIDS_SELECT_BY_DELETED_DATE
named-query.query: SELECT pd.productUid FROM ProductDeletedImpl pd WHERE pd.deletedDate >= ?1

named-query.name: OBJECT_UIDS_SELECT_BY_DELETED_DATE
named-query.query: SELECT od.objectUid FROM ObjectDeletedImpl od WHERE od.objectType = ?1 AND od.deletedDate >= ?2

named-query.name: PRODUCT_SELECT_BY_GUID
named-query.query: SELECT p FROM ProductImpl p WHERE p.code = ?1

named-query.name: PRODUCT_SELECT_TOP_SELLERS
named-query.query: SELECT p FROM ProductImpl p ORDER BY p.salesCount DESC

named-query.name: PRODUCT_SELECT_BY_MODIFIED_DATE
named-query.query: SELECT p FROM ProductImpl p WHERE p.lastModifiedDate >= ?1

named-query.name: PRODUCT_SELECT_ALL
named-query.query: SELECT p FROM ProductImpl p

named-query.name: PRODUCT_SELECT
named-query.query: SELECT p FROM ProductImpl p WHERE p.uidPk = ?1

named-query.name: PRODUCT_SELECT_WITH_CATEGORY
named-query.query: SELECT p FROM ProductImpl p INNER JOIN FETCH p.productCategories WHERE p.uidPk = ?1

named-query.name: PRODUCT_SELECT_ALL_EAGER
named-query.query: SELECT p FROM ProductImpl p LEFT OUTER JOIN FETCH p.catalogPrices LEFT OUTER JOIN FETCH p.productSkusInternal LEFT OUTER JOIN FETCH p.productCategories LEFT OUTER JOIN FETCH p.localeDependantFieldsMap LEFT OUTER JOIN FETCH p.attributeValueMap

named-query.name: PRODUCT_UIDS_ALL
named-query.query: SELECT p.uidPk FROM ProductImpl p

named-query.name: PRODUCT_SELECT_BY_CATEGORY_UID
named-query.query: SELECT p FROM ProductImpl p INNER JOIN p.productCategories pc WHERE pc.category.uidPk = ?1 ORDER BY p.uidPk ASC

named-query.name: PRODUCT_UID_SELECT_BY_CATEGORY_UID
named-query.query: SELECT p.uidPk FROM ProductImpl p INNER JOIN p.productCategories pc WHERE pc.category.uidPk = ?1 ORDER BY p.uidPk ASC

named-query.name: PRODUCT_SELECT_BY_BRAND_UID
named-query.query: SELECT p FROM ProductImpl p WHERE p.brand.uidPk = ?1 ORDER BY p.uidPk ASC

named-query.name: PRODUCT_UID_SELECT_BY_BRAND_UID
named-query.query: SELECT p.uidPk FROM ProductImpl p WHERE p.brand.uidPk = ?1 ORDER BY p.uidPk ASC

named-query.name: PRODUCT_UIDS_AVAILABLE
named-query.query: SELECT p.uidPk FROM ProductImpl p WHERE p.startDate <= ?1 AND ( p.endDate IS NULL OR p.endDate >= ?2 )

named-query.name: PRODUCT_UIDS_AVAILABLE_SELECT_BY_MODIFIED_DATE
named-query.query: SELECT p.uidPk FROM ProductImpl p WHERE p.lastModifiedDate >= ?1 AND p.startDate <= ?2 AND ( p.endDate IS NULL OR p.endDate >= ?3 )

named-query.name: PRODUCT_UIDS_SELECT_BY_MODIFIED_DATE
named-query.query: SELECT p.uidPk FROM ProductImpl p WHERE p.lastModifiedDate >= ?1

named-query.name: PRODUCT_UID_SELECT_BY_GUID
named-query.query: SELECT p.uidPk FROM ProductImpl p WHERE p.code = ?1

named-query.name: PRODUCT_CODE_SELECT_BY_UID
named-query.query: SELECT p.uidPk, p.code FROM ProductImpl p WHERE p.uidPk in (:list)

named-query.name: PRODUCT_UIDS_BY_SKUOPTION
named-query.query: SELECT p.uidPk FROM ProductImpl p, IN(p.productType.skuOptions) so WHERE so.uidPk = ?1

named-query.name: PRODUCT_UID_BY_CATEGORY
named-query.query: SELECT DISTINCT p.uidPk FROM ProductImpl p INNER JOIN p.productCategories pc WHERE pc.category.uidPk = ?1

named-query.name: PRODUCT_GUID_SELECT_BY_GUID
named-query.query: SELECT p.code FROM ProductImpl p WHERE p.code = ?1

named-query.name: SELECT_PRODUCT_CATEGORY_ASSOCIATION
named-query.query: SELECT pc.uidPk FROM ProductImpl p INNER JOIN p.productCategories pc WHERE p.uidPk = ?1 AND pc.category.uidPk = ?2

named-query.name: CATEGORY_UID_SELECT_BY_PRODUCT_UID
named-query.query: SELECT pc.category.uidPk FROM ProductImpl p INNER JOIN p.productCategories pc WHERE p.uidPk = ?1

named-query.name: FEATURED_PRODUCT_SELECT_BY_CAT_UID
named-query.query: SELECT p, pc.featuredProductOrder FROM ProductImpl p INNER JOIN p.productCategories pc WHERE pc.category.uidPk = ?1 AND pc.featuredProductOrder IS NOT null AND pc.featuredProductOrder <> 0 ORDER BY pc.featuredProductOrder, p.uidPk ASC

named-query.name: FEATURED_PRODUCT_UID_SELECT_BY_CAT_UID
named-query.query: SELECT p.uidPk FROM ProductImpl p INNER JOIN p.productCategories pc WHERE pc.category.uidPk = ?1 AND pc.featuredProductOrder IS NOT null and pc.featuredProductOrder <> 0 ORDER BY pc.featuredProductOrder, p.uidPk ASC

named-query.name: PRODUCT_UPDATE_MODIFIED_TIME_BY_PRODUCT_TYPE
named-query.query: UPDATE ProductImpl p SET p.lastModifiedDate = ?1 WHERE p.productType.uidPk = ?2

named-query.name: PRODUCT_UPDATE_MODIFIED_TIME_BY_UID
named-query.query: UPDATE ProductImpl p SET p.lastModifiedDate = ?1 WHERE p.uidPk = ?2

named-query.name: PRODUCT_UPDATE_MODIFIED_TIME_BY_BRAND
named-query.query: UPDATE ProductImpl p SET p.lastModifiedDate = ?1 WHERE p.brand.uidPk = ?2

named-query.name: PRODUCT_UPDATE_DEFAULT_SKU_NULL
named-query.query: UPDATE ProductImpl p SET p.defaultSku = null WHERE p.defaultSku.uidPk = ?1

named-query.name: PRODUCT_SELECT_SALES_COUNT_AND_CATEGORY_UIDS
named-query.query: SELECT p.salesCount, p.uidPk FROM ProductImpl p INNER JOIN p.productCategories pc WHERE pc.category.uidPk in (:list) ORDER BY p.salesCount DESC

named-query.name: PRODUCT_BY_UIDS
named-query.query: SELECT p FROM ProductImpl p WHERE p.uidPk in (:list)

named-query.name: PRODUCT_BY_GUIDS
named-query.query: SELECT p FROM ProductImpl p WHERE p.code in (:list)

named-query.name: PRODUCT_UID_FOR_SKU_CODE
named-query.query: SELECT p.uidPk FROM ProductSkuImpl ps JOIN ps.productInternal p WHERE ps.skuCodeInternal = :skuCode

named-query.name: PRODUCT_UID_FOR_SKU_UID
named-query.query: SELECT p.uidPk FROM ProductSkuImpl ps JOIN ps.productInternal p WHERE ps.uidPk = :skuUid

named-query.name: PRODUCT_UIDS_FOR_SKU_UIDS
named-query.query: SELECT p.uidPk FROM ProductSkuImpl ps JOIN ps.productInternal p WHERE ps.uidPk IN (:list)

named-query.name: BUNDLE_ENRICH_DTO_BY_GUIDS
named-query.query: SELECT p.code, pldf.displayName, pt.multiSku, MIN(psku.skuCodeInternal) FROM ProductBundleImpl p LEFT JOIN p.productSkusInternal psku INNER JOIN p.localeDependantFieldsMap as pldf INNER JOIN p.productType as pt WHERE pldf.locale = ?1 AND p.code in (:list) GROUP BY p.code, pldf.displayName, pldf.locale, pt.multiSku

named-query.name: PRODUCT_ENRICH_DTO_BY_GUIDS
named-query.query: SELECT p.code, pldf.displayName, pt.multiSku, MIN(psku.skuCodeInternal) FROM ProductImpl p LEFT JOIN p.productSkusInternal psku INNER JOIN p.localeDependantFieldsMap as pldf INNER JOIN p.productType as pt WHERE pldf.locale = ?1 AND p.code in (:list) GROUP BY p.code, pldf.displayName, pldf.locale, pt.multiSku

named-query.name: PRODUCT_SKU_ENRICH_DTO_BY_GUIDS
named-query.query: SELECT p.code, pldf.displayName, pt.multiSku, psku.skuCodeInternal FROM ProductSkuImpl AS psku INNER JOIN psku.productInternal p INNER JOIN p.localeDependantFieldsMap as pldf INNER JOIN p.productType as pt WHERE pldf.locale = ?1 AND psku.skuCodeInternal in (:list)

named-query.name: PRODUCT_SKU_OPTION_ENRICH_DTO_BY_GUIDS
named-query.query: SELECT psku.skuCodeInternal, lpm.value, ovm.optionKey FROM ProductSkuImpl AS psku INNER JOIN psku.optionValueMap ovm INNER JOIN ovm.skuOptionValue ov INNER JOIN ov.localizedPropertiesMap lpm WHERE psku.skuCodeInternal in (:list) AND lpm.localizedPropertyKey = CONCAT('skuOptionValueDisplayName_',?1) ORDER BY ovm.optionKey ASC

named-query.name: PRODUCT_UID_SELECT_BY_CATEGORY_UIDS
named-query.query: SELECT DISTINCT p.uidPk FROM ProductImpl p INNER JOIN p.productCategories pc WHERE pc.category.uidPk IN (:list)

named-query.name: PRODUCT_UPDATE_MODIFIED_TIME_BY_UIDS
named-query.query: UPDATE ProductImpl p SET p.lastModifiedDate = ?1 WHERE p.uidPk IN (:list)

named-query.name: PRODUCT_UIDS_FIND_BY_STORE_UID
named-query.query: SELECT p.uidPk FROM ProductImpl p, IN(p.productCategories) pc, StoreImpl s WHERE pc.category.catalog = s.catalog AND s.uidPk = ?1

named-query.name: UPDATE_PRODUCT_SALES_COUNT_BY
named-query.query: UPDATE ProductImpl p SET p.salesCount = ?1, p.lastModifiedDate = ?2 WHERE p.uidPk = ?3

named-query.name: SELECT_PRODUCT_SALES_COUNT
named-query.query: SELECT p.salesCount FROM ProductImpl p WHERE p.uidPk = ?1

named-query.name: PRODUCT_DATA_SELECT_TOP_SELLERS
named-query.query: SELECT p.salesCount, p.uidPk FROM ProductImpl p ORDER BY p.salesCount DESC

named-query.name: PRODUCT_NAME_IN_DEFAULT_LOCALE_BY_CODE
named-query.query: SELECT ldf.displayName FROM ProductImpl p, IN(p.localeDependantFieldsMap) ldf, IN(p.productCategories) pc WHERE p.code = ?1 AND pc.category.catalog.master = true AND ldf.locale = pc.category.catalog.defaultLocaleInternal

named-query.name: PRODUCTSKU_COUNT_BY_PRODUCT
named-query.query: SELECT count(ps.uidPk) FROM ProductSkuImpl ps WHERE ps.productInternal.uidPk = ?1

named-query.name: PRODUCTSKU_GUID_BY_PRODUCT
named-query.query: SELECT ps.skuCodeInternal FROM ProductSkuImpl ps WHERE ps.productInternal.code like ?1

named-query.name: PRODUCT_SKU_SELECT_BY_GUID
named-query.query: SELECT p FROM ProductSkuImpl p WHERE p.skuCodeInternal = ?1

named-query.name: PRODUCT_SKU_GUID_SELECT_BY_GUID
named-query.query: SELECT p.skuCodeInternal FROM ProductSkuImpl p WHERE p.skuCodeInternal = ?1

named-query.name: PRODUCTSKU_SELECT_BY_PRODUCT_UID
named-query.query: SELECT ps FROM ProductSkuImpl ps WHERE ps.productInternal.uidPk = ?1 ORDER BY ps.skuCodeInternal ASC, ps.uidPk ASC

named-query.name: PRODUCTSKU_SELECT_BY_SKU_CODE
named-query.query: SELECT ps FROM ProductSkuImpl ps WHERE ps.skuCodeInternal = ?1

named-query.name: PRODUCTSKU_SELECT_BY_GUID
named-query.query: SELECT ps FROM ProductSkuImpl ps WHERE ps.guid = ?1

named-query.name: PRODUCT_SKUS_BY_SKU_CODES
named-query.query: SELECT ps FROM ProductSkuImpl ps WHERE ps.skuCodeInternal IN (:list)

named-query.name: PRODUCT_SKUS_BY_SKU_UIDS
named-query.query: SELECT ps FROM ProductSkuImpl ps WHERE ps.uidPk IN (:list)

named-query.name: PRODUCTSKU_COUNT_BY_NAME
named-query.query: SELECT count(p.uidPk) FROM ProductSkuImpl p WHERE p.skuCodeInternal = ?1 AND p.uidPk <> ?2

named-query.name: PRODUCTSKU_COUNT_BY_PRODUCT_CODE
named-query.query: SELECT COUNT(p.uidPk) FROM ProductSkuImpl p WHERE p.productInternal.code = ?1

named-query.name: PRODUCT_SKU_UID_SELECT_BY_GUID
named-query.query: SELECT p.uidPk FROM ProductSkuImpl p WHERE p.skuCodeInternal = ?1

named-query.name: PRODUCT_UID_BY_SKU_GUID
named-query.query: SELECT p.uidPk FROM ProductSkuImpl sku INNER JOIN sku.productInternal p WHERE sku.guid = ?1

named-query.name: PRODUCT_UIDS_BY_SKU_GUIDS
named-query.query: SELECT p.uidPk FROM ProductSkuImpl sku INNER JOIN sku.productInternal p WHERE sku.guid IN (:list)

named-query.name: PRODUCT_UIDS_BY_SKUCODES
named-query.query: SELECT p.uidPk FROM ProductSkuImpl sku INNER JOIN sku.productInternal p WHERE sku.skuCodeInternal IN (:list)

named-query.name: PRODUCTSKU_SELECT_BY_SKUCODE_LIKE_AND_CATEGORY_UIDS
named-query.query: SELECT sku FROM ProductSkuImpl sku INNER JOIN sku.productInternal p INNER JOIN p.productCategories pc WHERE sku.skuCodeInternal LIKE ?1 AND pc.category.uidPk IN (:list) ORDER BY sku.skuCodeInternal asc, sku.uidPk asc

named-query.name: PRODUCT_SKU_SELECT
named-query.query: SELECT ps FROM ProductSkuImpl ps WHERE ps.uidPk = ?1

named-query.name: PRODUCT_SKU_EXISTS
named-query.query: SELECT ps.skuCodeInternal FROM ProductSkuImpl ps WHERE ps.skuCodeInternal IN (:list) AND ps.productInternal.uidPk <> ?1

named-query.name: PRODUCT_SKU_PRE_OR_BACK_ORDER_DETAILS
named-query.query: SELECT NEW com.elasticpath.domain.catalog.impl.PreOrBackOrderDetails(sku.skuCodeInternal, sku.productInternal.preOrBackOrderLimitInternal, sku.preOrBackOrderedQuantity) FROM ProductSkuImpl sku WHERE sku.skuCodeInternal = ?1

named-query.name: PRODUCTSKU_UIDS_SINCE_PRODUCT_LAST_MODIFIED
named-query.query: SELECT ps.uidPk FROM ProductSkuImpl ps WHERE ps.productInternal.lastModifiedDate >= ?1

named-query.name: PRODUCTSKU_UIDS_ALL
named-query.query: SELECT ps.uidPk FROM ProductSkuImpl ps

named-query.name: PRODUCT_TYPE_SELECT_ALL
named-query.query: SELECT pt FROM ProductTypeImpl pt

named-query.name: PRODUCT_TYPE_SELECT_ALL_EAGER
named-query.query: SELECT pt FROM ProductTypeImpl pt LEFT OUTER JOIN FETCH pt.productAttributeGroupAttributes LEFT OUTER JOIN FETCH pt.skuAttributeGroupAttributes

named-query.name: PRODUCT_TYPE_BY_CATALOG_EAGER
named-query.query: SELECT pt FROM ProductTypeImpl pt LEFT OUTER JOIN FETCH pt.productAttributeGroupAttributes LEFT OUTER JOIN FETCH pt.skuAttributeGroupAttributes WHERE pt.catalog.uidPk = ?1

named-query.name: PRODUCT_TYPE_USED_UIDS
named-query.query: SELECT DISTINCT pt.uidPk FROM ProductImpl p LEFT OUTER JOIN p.productType pt

named-query.name: PRODUCT_TYPE_COUNT_BY_NAME
named-query.query: SELECT count(pt.uidPk) FROM ProductTypeImpl pt WHERE pt.name = ?1 AND pt.uidPk <> ?2

named-query.name: PRODUCT_LIST_PRODUCT_TYPE
named-query.query: SELECT p FROM ProductImpl p WHERE p.productType.uidPk = ?1

named-query.name: TAX_CODES_WITH_PRODUCT_TYPE
named-query.query: SELECT distinct pt.taxCode.code FROM ProductTypeImpl as pt

named-query.name: TAX_CODES_WITH_PRODUCT
named-query.query: SELECT DISTINCT p.taxCodeOverride.code FROM ProductImpl AS p

named-query.name: PRODUCTSKU_LIST_PRODUCT_TYPE
named-query.query: SELECT ps FROM ProductSkuImpl ps LEFT OUTER JOIN ps.productInternal p WHERE p.productType.uidPk = ?1

named-query.name: PRODUCT_TYPE_SELECT_CATALOG_ALL
named-query.query: SELECT pt FROM ProductTypeImpl pt WHERE pt.catalog.uidPk = ?1 ORDER BY pt.guid

named-query.name: PRODUCT_TYPE_FIND_BY_NAME
named-query.query: SELECT pt FROM ProductTypeImpl pt WHERE pt.name = ?1

named-query.name: FIND_PRODUCT_TYPE_BY_GUID
named-query.query: SELECT pt FROM ProductTypeImpl pt WHERE pt.guid = ?1

named-query.name: PRODUCT_TYPE_IN_USE
named-query.query: SELECT p.productType.uidPk FROM ProductImpl p WHERE p.productType.uidPk = ?1

named-query.name: PRODUCT_TYPE_FIND_BY_SKUCODE
named-query.query: SELECT sku.productInternal.productType FROM ProductSkuImpl AS sku WHERE sku.skuCodeInternal = ?1

named-query.name: TOP_SELLER_SELECT_BY_CATEGORY_UID
named-query.query: SELECT tsc FROM TopSellerImpl AS tsc WHERE tsc.categoryUid = ?1

named-query.name: FIND_ALL_CATALOG_LOCALES
named-query.query: SELECT c FROM CatalogLocaleImpl c

named-query.name: NOT_ALWAYS_AVAILABLE_PRODUCT_BY_SKU_CODE
named-query.query: SELECT new com.elasticpath.domain.catalog.impl.ProductSkuImpl(psku.skuCodeInternal,p.availabilityCriteriaInternal) FROM ProductSkuImpl as psku INNER JOIN psku.productInternal p WHERE psku.skuCodeInternal = ?1 AND p.availabilityCriteriaInternal <> com.elasticpath.domain.catalog.AvailabilityCriteria.ALWAYS_AVAILABLE
